DOC.brief_summary: Objectives : The aim measure one year change caloric compensation ( CC ) eat absence hunger ( EAH ) 3 6 year-old French child regular eat context link change individual characteristic ( adiposity , age , gender ) maternal feeding practice . Three series measurement caloric compensation ( CC ) eat absence hunger ( EAH ) conduct : baseline , 3 ( FU3M ) 15 ( FU15M ) month later . Each serie measurement compose three consecutive week identical lunch serve four preschool canteen reach 236 child . The first lunch control session . For CC situation ( week 2 ) , thirty minute lunch child offer preload ( 137 kcal ) . For EAH situation ( week 3 ) , ten minute lunch child expose palatable food ( 430 kcal ) . Food intake measure individual level . Maternal eat behaviour feeding practice measure questionnaire . Child 's height weight measure medical doctor .
DOC.brief_title: Longitudinal Measurement Caloric Compensation Eating Absence Hunger French Preschool Children
DOC.criteria: To register school canteen , provide parental approval inclusion FU15M Chronic disease food allergy
